mapper.update: insert into account(account_number, user_id, bank_id, account_type_id, balance) values (#{accountNumber}, #{userId}, #{bankId}, #{accountTypeId}, #{balance});

insert into transaction(account_id, amount, transaction_type, category, description, transaction_date) values (#{accountId}, #{amount}, #{transactionType}, #{category}, #{description}, #{transactionDate});
insert into stock_holdings(user_id, stock_symbol, stock_name, purchase_price, quantity, purchase_date) values (#{userId}, #{stockSymbol}, #{stockName}, #{purchasePrice}, #{quantity}, #{purchaseDate})
mapper.select: select t.account_id, t.amount, t.transaction_type, t.category, t.description, t.transaction_date from transaction t join account a on t.account_id = a.account_id join user u on a.user_id = u.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId} order by t.transaction_date desc

select t.account_id as accountId, a.account_number as accountNumber, t.amount, t.transaction_type as transactionType, t.category, t.description as description, t.transaction_date as transactionDate, b.bank_id as bankId from transaction t join account a on t.account_id = a.account_id join user u on a.user_id = u.user_id join bank b on a.bank_id = b.bank_id where u.user_id = #{userId} order by t.transaction_date desc;

SELECT COALESCE(ra.total_price, 0) as total_price FROM user u JOIN ( SELECT ra.user_id, SUM(sr.transaction_amount) * 100000000 AS total_price FROM realestate_asset ra JOIN sg_real sr ON ra.realestate_no = sr.no GROUP BY ra.user_id ) AS ra ON u.user_id = ra.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId};

SELECT COALESCE(ca.total_price, 0) as total_price FROM user u JOIN ( SELECT ca.user_id, SUM(c.car_price) AS total_price FROM car_asset ca JOIN car c ON ca.car_no = c.car_no GROUP BY ca.user_id ) AS ca ON u.user_id = ca.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId};
SELECT * FROM user WHERE FLOOR((age - 1) / 5) = ( SELECT FLOOR((age - 1) / 5) FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId} )
SELECT COALESCE(c.car_price, 0) FROM user u LEFT JOIN car c ON u.car_no = c.car_no WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(r.transaction_amount * 100000000), 0) FROM user u LEFT JOIN sg_real r ON u.realestate_no = r.no WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
select account_id, account_number, user_id, bank_id, account_type_id, balance from account where user_id = (select user_id from user where user_name = #{userName});

with tb1 as (select transaction_id, account_id, case when transaction_type = '출금' then amount * -1 when transaction_type = '입금' then amount end as amount, transaction_type, category, description, date_format(transaction_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as transaction_date from transaction)
select transaction_date, coalesce(sum(amount), 0) as amount from tb1 where account_id in (select account_id from account where user_id = (select user_id from user where user_name = #{userName}) and transaction_date between date_format( date_sub(date_add(now(), interval 9 hour), interval 9 day), '%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(date_add(now(), interval 9 hour), '%Y-%m-%d')) group by 1 order by 1 desc;
select stock_symbol, stock_name, purchase_price, sum(quantity) as quantity, purchase_date from stock_holdings where user_id = (select user_id from user where user_name = #{userName}) group by 1;

select coalesce(c.car_no, 0) as car_no, coalesce(c.car_model, '없음') as car_model, coalesce(c.car_price, 0) as car_price from car_asset ca left join car c on ca.car_no = c.car_no where ca.user_id = #{userId};

select coalesce(s.city, "없음") as city, coalesce(s.street_number, "없음") as street_number, coalesce(s.estate_name, "없음") as estate_name, coalesce(s.exclusive_area, "없음") as exclusive_area, coalesce(s.transaction_amount, 0) * 100000000 as transaction_amount, coalesce(s.street_name, "없음") as street_name, coalesce(s.house_type, "없음") as house_type from realestate_asset ra left join sg_real s on ra.realestate_no = s.no where ra.user_id = #{userId};

select t.category as 'category', sum(t.amount) as 'amount' from transaction t join account a on t.account_id = a.account_id where a.user_id = #{userId} and t.transaction_type = '출금' group by t.category order by amount desc
select car_no from car
select no from sg_real
